text: Nugola is a town in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Collesalvetti, province of Livorno. At the time of the 2011 census its population was 874. Nugola is about 14 km from Livorno and 6 km from Collesalvetti. == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Livorno
title: Nugola
